1.0.2.name: wordpress/tincanviewer
1.0.2.description: This plugin allows users to connect to a Tin Can (Experience API) Learning Record Store and send statements about learning experiences. It has a configuration screen to set the Endpoint for statements and allows administrators to setup shortcodes that display Tin Can content, as well as send statements to a LRS. You must have at least a free LRS account at vTrainingTracker.com to use this plugin.
